    • Method Detail

      • raveCoefficient

        public double raveCoefficient(double w,
                     double rw,
                     double c,
                     double rc)
        Assuming UCT is unbiased and RAVE is biased, so the difference between the two estimates RAVE bias. This method returns the coefficient (weight beta) for the RAVE player, and it is the coefficient that minimizes the mean square error of the convex sum of RAVE and UCT.

      • searchValue

        public double searchValue(SearchNode node,
                 Board board,
                 int move)
        Description copied from class: MctsPlayer
        Returns the UCT upper bound for node. This is the UCB1-TUNED policy, explained in the tech report by Gelly, et al, "Modification of UCT with Patterns in Monte-Carlo Go". The formula is at the bottom of p. 5 in that paper.
        Overrides:
        searchValue in class RavePlayer
